content.title: HELLO WORLD (Exercise 1 of 13)
body: Write a program that prints the text "HELLO WORLD" to the console (stdout).
To make a Node.js program, create a new file with a .js extension and start writing JavaScript!
Execute your program by running it with the node command. e.g.:
and save file with name: program.js
